con:part.con:content: <definitions name="QueryDeviceTestInfoWECOReqABCSImpl" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.alliantenergy.com/AssetManagement/DeviceTestInfo/V1" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:svcdoc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/Services/Documentation/V1" xmlns:tns="http://xmlns.alliantenergy.com/AssetManagement/DeviceTestInfo/V1" xmlns:ns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/03/addressing"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Service> <svcdoc:Description>WECO DeviceTestInfo Service</svcdoc:Description> <svcdoc:DisplayName>QueryDeviceTestInfoWECOReqABCSImpl</svcdoc:DisplayName> <svcdoc:Version>1.00</svcdoc:Version> <svcdoc:LifecycleStatus>Active</svcdoc:LifecycleStatus> <svcdoc:Industry>Utilities</svcdoc:Industry> </svcdoc:Service> </documentation> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.alliantenergy.com/AssetManagement/DeviceTestInfo/V1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--<xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.alliantenergy.com/AssetManagement/DeviceTestInfo/V1" schemaLocation="../../../../../../../AssetManagement/DeviceTestInfo/V1/WECODeviceTestInfoABM.xsd"/> </xsd:schema>--> <xsd:element name="QueryDeviceTestInfoABM" type="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoABMType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>WECO Device Test Info ABM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABM" type="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABMType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>WECO Device Test Info Response ABM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFault" type="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoFaultType"/> <xsd:complexType name="QueryDeviceTestInfoABMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DeviceType" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Device type describes whether the device is Electric (MR), CT or a PT</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ServiceType" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contains Service Type Code , 'E'</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DeviceNumber" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Device Number is the Meter Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Company" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company Indicates the company Code , IPL (I) and WPL (W)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Tester" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This will contain the valid Tester ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TestStandard" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contains the valid Test board/prover</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TestLocation" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contains the valid Device Testing location code or its corresponding disribution center</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--===== Response =====--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ClassificationCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contains Classification Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TestReason" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This contains the reason for Test</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NewDeviceIndicator" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This field indicates whether the device is new</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LastTestDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This field will contain the last test date in YYYY-MM-DD format.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LossCompensationCodeFlag" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CommunicationBoardVersion" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CommunicationModuleFirmwareVersion" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--======================================================================--> <!--===== Fault Element =====--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="tns:FaultNotification" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultNotificationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BusinessComponentID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ReportingDateTime" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CorrectiveAction" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element ref="tns:FaultMessage" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element ref="tns:FaultingService" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultMessageType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Code" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Text" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="Severity" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="Stack" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="ApplicationFaultData" type="xsd:anyType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FaultingServiceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ImplementationCode" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="InstanceID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ExecutionContextID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Also known as ECID in SOA Suite. This is an ID generated for a group of service invocations/executions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FaultNotification" type="tns:FaultNotificationType"/> <xsd:element name="FaultMessage" type="tns:FaultMessageType"/> <xsd:element name="FaultingService" type="tns:FaultingServiceType"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="QueryDeviceTestInfoReqMsg"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Message> <svcdoc:Description>This message is used as the request payload to the Query Device Test Information</svcdoc:Description> </svcdoc:Message> </documentation> <part name="QueryDeviceTestInfoABM" element="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoABM"/> </message> <message name="QueryDeviceTestInfoRespMsg"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Message> <svcdoc:Description>This message is used as the response payload to the Query Device Test Information</svcdoc:Description> </svcdoc:Message> </documentation> <part name="QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABM" element="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABM"/> </message> <message name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFaultMsg"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Message> <svcdoc:Description>This message is used for propagating Error Context and Error Message</svcdoc:Description> </svcdoc:Message> </documentation> <part name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFault" element="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoFault"/> </message> <portType name="DeviceTestInfoABCS"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Interface> <svcdoc:Description>This interface contains operations for the Request-Response patterns</svcdoc:Description> <svcdoc:DisplayName>WECO Query Device Test Info Interface</svcdoc:DisplayName> <svcdoc:LifecycleStatus>Active</svcdoc:LifecycleStatus> </svcdoc:Interface> </documentation> <operation name="Query"> <documentation> <svcdoc:Operation> <svcdoc:Description>This operation is used to Query DeviceTestInfo.</svcdoc:Description> <svcdoc:MEP>SYNC_REQ_RESPONSE</svcdoc:MEP> <svcdoc:DisplayName>QueryDeviceTestInfo</svcdoc:DisplayName> <svcdoc:LifecycleStatus>Active</svcdoc:LifecycleStatus> <svcdoc:Scope>Public</svcdoc:Scope> </svcdoc:Operation> </documentation> <input message="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoReqMsg"/> <output message="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoRespMsg"/> <fault name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFault" message="tns:QueryDeviceTestInfoFaultMsg"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="DeviceTestInfoABCSSOAP11Binding" type="tns:DeviceTestInfoABCS"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="Query"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://xmlns.alliantenergy.com/DeviceTestInfo/V1/Query" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body parts="QueryDeviceTestInfoABM" use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body parts="QueryDeviceTestInfoResponseABM" use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="QueryDeviceTestInfoFault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="DeviceTestInfoABCS"> <port name="DeviceTestInfoABCSPort" binding="tns:DeviceTestInfoABCSSOAP11Binding"> <soap:address location="ENDPOINT_LOCATION"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
